1.content:
What a cocktail that must have been! You went to bed after a party and awoke to find yourself floating through... what looks like website after website, flying past you at incredible speeds! You're in the internet!

Suddenly, a woman's voice breaks your awe. The soft voice sounds comforting, soothing. "Hello." it says, "My name is Radia. You have been chosen."

"Chosen?" you ask, confused, "Chosen for what?"

"I have watched the lives of the chosen for aeons, my child." it speaks warmly, like a mother to her own child, "But only you have been called and chosen to save the Digital World."

"The Digital World?" you blink, "You mean... like from Digimon?"

"Precisely." Radia says, "The Digital World in your television show is connected to every and all universes in existence. In that sense, your television show is reality, the core of existence."

DEFINATELY one hell of a cocktail. You shake your head, "So... everything there is REAL? It's happening?"

"In a sense." Radia replies, "However, there is a problem. Ken Ichijouji never released power."

"What!?"

"He is still the Digimon Emperor, past the time when, in the show, he was supposed to have relinquished said power. Now he fights even harder to destroy the DigiDestined and completely rule the Digital World, and beyond."

"And beyond?"

Radia sighs softly, "He knows that he who controls the Digital World controls existence. Once he would take over the Digital World, he would expand his empire to every other universe there is -- your own included."

Now you're getting worried and even more intrigued, "And the DigiDestined are still fighting to keep him from taking over?"

"Indeed. However... both sides have started to up the ante. The fighting has become even more fierce than you would have ever thought possible on the show. More and more kids are being brought into this conflict... and more and more of them die. While many of the children fight on the side of the DigiDestined Resistance, the Emperor even has his own group, called the Dark DigiDestined, that serve him unquestioningly. There are some yet that choose neither side..." she hesitates, "...however, they are hated by both sides for their refusal to join their group, and many are killed."

You blink, somewhat overwhelmed.

"Let me tell you now..." she continues, "It does not matter which side you are on. The fighting in the Digital World has become so bad that the world has threatened to destroy itself. And without the Digital World... the core of existence will be destroyed. In other words, if the Digital World is destroyed, existence, as we know it, would... CEASE to exist! We'll ALL be destroyed!"

You shiver, the idea of such frightening you half to death. Now, you know how serious this is. You pinch yourself. Twice. Three times. Before you get get to the fourth, you hear Radia say, "This isn't a dream, young one... this is reality."

"What... what can I do!?" you exclaim, "I'm just a kid!"

"No one is just a kid, child... you have the abilities... and I will give you the rest of what you need to succeed in your task."

"What IS my task?"

"Join the Digital Empire. Join the DigiDestined Resistance. Join neither, and go alone. You MUST stop this fighting before it's too late!"

The websites stop flashing past and everything goes dark. When light reappears again, you're standing in a small chamber, like an elevator. Before you is a small panel.

"I will be watching you, child." Radia's voice echoes into your mind, "Choose wisely."

You look at the panel before you. Words flash across the screen:
CHOOSE YOUR DESTINY

Your first choice: which side will you join?
1.title: The Digital Wars

11.content:
More words flash across the screen:
CHOOSE YOUR WEAPON
11.title: Weapon

111.content:
You press the button and the chamber goes dark, save for the panel screen. The buttons fade, and it is replaced by a young man with wild blue hair and a pair of interesting-looking glasses. He speaks harshly to you.

"It's about time you showed up." he says with a slight smirk, "I am the Digimon Emperor, your lord and master. Do you understand?"

"Yes, sir!" you respond quickly.

"Despite whatever you may have been called before, you will now only answer to Kasen. Understood?"

"Yes, sir!"

"Good. I will be bringing you to my fortress. Prepare yourself."

With that, the panel turns off and you're left in darkness.
111.title: Sword -- The Emperor's Pride

choices: Remain outside and think a bit longer
1111.content:
The image of your new "master" faded from view as the room sank into utter darkness. This silence gave you a moment to put everything in perspective. Assuming this was not all some sort of warped dream, you were being dragged into a struggle for reality itself; what you had thought was a TV show was infact the core of all universes. But this raised a diffrent question; if the show was wrong, did the creators mistake the reality of the situation, or did something infact alter history, preventing Ken's redemption?

With your knowledge of the series you were able to form a quick list of "likely suspects" that could have something to do with it. Because Ken was still in power, assumedly Myotismon was still in spirit form; interfering with Ken's objectives was not in his favor. Your attempts at rationalizing these events were pushed aside as the lights around you began to reappear, and the transportation sequence started. For an instant light flooded your vision, and then as quickly as it had appeared it was gone once again. However you now stood in a new area, you recognized it as the exterior of the floating base which Ken had used for his stronghold.

The large door before you was open, it seemed Ken expected his soldiers to at the very least be capable of finding the way to him on their own. As you started towards the door you realized that you now wore new clothing, obviously the uniform of the Dark Digidestined. From your belt hung a rather fancy looking sword, however a mere glance could tell you it was far from simply decorative. A cold wind blew across the fortress due to it's altitude, making it rather uncomfortable outside, and staying in it did not seem a wise choice. You did have a few moments to let the reality of your new purpose to sink in however.
1111.title: Outside the Fortress

choices: Listen to what the Emperor has to say
11111.content:
The thought of staying out in the wind is unpleasant, however making Ken wait is probably even less wise for your health. The large door in the side of the rocklike structure suddenly begins to shift, it's obvious that the Emperor is not happy with your stalling. You break into a run as the door begins to drop, however it is slow moving and you make it in with time to spare. The door seals shut a few moments later, leaving you in the darkness of Ken's stronghold.

You cannot much remember the layout of his fortress from the show, though it would not likely be a large help in three dimensions, and you are forced to find your way through the complex's tunnels. Thankfully you find it relativly straightforward, there are only two major intersections, and at both going straight seems to lead further towards the center of the building. A large steel door marks the end of the hallway you had followed, and as you approuch it begins to creak open. The sound is truly chilling, however what you see next wipes the fear from your mind.

The boy from before is at the end of the room, standing atop a large pedistal. Beneath him is a large group of children around your own age, all wearing the same uniforms, and many digimon. As you slip past the steel door Ken turns on his platform to give you a look. "Well, I thought you might never make it. Now that everyone is here..." As the Emperor spoke, the door behind you slammed shut of it's own accord, sealing you into the dark chamber.

"I can begin. I assume you gained at least a basic understanding of the situation we are in before you were transported here; we can move on. All too often the chosen are immature children who simply want to play hero, and immediatly sign up for the resistance. These people tend to be short lived, however they can also provide a problem at times. You are the largest group of Dark Digidestined yet to be chosen, and this can only be a sign that the ignorant are gradually being weeded out; you have all indeed made the smart choice." Ken paused for a moment, to let his statement sink in.

It was at this time that a thought entered your mind. Ken seemed to be unarmed, aside from two bodyguards nearby, and the other new recruits were likely in the same mental state as you. With your sword you could likely overpower Ken before his guards could reach you; and once the Emperor was dead the others would have no reason to assist the guards against you; you could very well take his place in one swoop. On the other hand this sort of orientation was obviously common, and Ken more than likely had survived a number of assasination attempts. He more than likely has some form of protection you do not know about.
11111.title: Ken's welcome

1111122.content:
"LORD KEN! NOOOOO!"
''HE....HE'S DEAD!''
"HOLY SHIT!"
''LORD KEN HAS FALLEN!''
"DUDE'S GOTTA SWORD!?"
"WE'RE NEXT!"
"YOU ASSHOLE!"
"MOVE IT, PEOPLE!"
In a flash, the Dark Digidestined assembled panic and scatter, most fleeing towards the entrancebut some charging towards you with the two guards in an attempt to avenge their master, but you beat them back. One of them, a tall boy with black hair covering his eyes, stops near the throne room's entrance, and slams his fist into part of the frame. It shudders, the opens up to reveal a lever which the kid promptly pulls. A loud and panicky alarm begins to sound. The boy then runs off, never once looking back.
-----------------
All throughout the Dark Emperor's castle, the alarm rings loud and painful, clear as day, to all the Digimon under Ken's control. It rings with a message.
Your Emperor is dead. Avenge him.
And all throughout the castle, the Digimon begin to march towards the throne room, with one clear goal in their minds, thier CPU's and hardrives.
Avenge the Emperor.
As they march, a Digimon breaks of from the group. HI-Andromon, his name is. He rasies his finger to where his ear would be, and presses down, before speaking.
"The King is dead. Long live the king."
And the he returns to the Digimon marching to the throne room.
-----------------
As the last of the Dark Digidestined falls to the ground, unconscious, you allow yourself a moments reprieve. The guards lay, code spilling out of them like blood. The kids that Ken intended to turn into his personal assult force are knocked out....they were just like you. Normal kids.

But you aren't normal...not anymore.

You don't know what's wrong with you, but ever since you made your choice, you feel....different. Wrong. Like you aren't quite you...or right. (IS THIS THE SWORD'S DOING.....?)
Then you hear and feel it. The marching of a thousand terrible things. Ken's forces. How many Digimon had he enslaved that the show didn't recap or reveal?!
You have two choices. Attempt to run, or stay and fight. Ether way...you may not make it out alive.

111112222.content:
The DigiDestined Resistence Base. Once called File Island, it had been converted into a massive city-fortress that housed the small army of DigiDestined and Digimon that fought against Ken’s unrelenting army. Morale was currently on the low. Why that was, was due to lack of progress in pushing Ken out of his seat. The current grip he had(or had, they didn’t know that yet) on Sever was a big wide hold, and File Island was the only safe haven, as the retaken lands of Sever that the DigiDestined had were constantly under siege. And even then, File Island came under bombing runs now and then......

Within the main communication center, people sat, listening to the channels of war. Some listened with broken hearts of the Sever line, other listen to the communication channels of their own fortress, others made sure they weren’t bugged while bugging Ken’s lines. But it was a shock when a powerful message came through from an undercover agent....one they always hoped to hear.

"The King is dead. Long live the king."

Joy shot through the ones who heard it. This line, from a reliable source, meant that by some hand, Ken had died. Without him, his army’s would hopefully scatter and become unfocused, and they could wrap up this war and begin to heal......but they had to make sure.

The Leader, Tai, was informed of this. He was less optimistic, the war having shattered his optimism long ago when it had shown him the horrors of it. Never the less, if it was true......something had to be done. He could either actvate the Mega Riser, which was their ace-in the hole, a field that could force their Digimon into the Mega Level, powered by Calumon, and then order for a full on assault on all fronts, which could leave their bases undefended if Hi-Andromon had be hacked and was lying, or allow Davis to take Magnadramon and blow a clear hole right through the enemy defences....last time they had done that, Ken’s Dark DigiDestined had snapped back really hard.

"You mean-?" It asked surprised.

"Yes!!" You yell as you strike, then dodge a punch. CRAP!! It didn't even scratch him! Well It was now or never, you were never going to get away, so it was a fight to the death. Wich for you, wasn't much at this point. You calculate, that one solid hit would end you. You dodge another punch, swinging and stabbing anything you could was your only option... that and not getting hit.

Suddenly, your sword glows a light blue. You could see the form of the sword change from a normal sword, to a skinnier, slightly curved form. Probably to adjust to its new strength. Omnimon was stunned at the newest development. You took this opportunity to attack, the sword struck and a scratch was made!

"Huh?" The Omnimon was once again bewildered, as he took more and more attacks, he noted that your sword slowly sunk deeper and deeper into his thick armor.

You were having a blast, it was like a game, fight to level up so you could take on the boss. You felt more energetic, faster, and as you continued to attack, you felt stronger. The Omnimon was getting pissed, not getting a hit in, and taking continually increasing damage.

Your next slice drew blood! Not much but it was a start, you were in the clear. But something hit you, memory-wize. Digimon had Special attacks, that they could use freely. You looked up at you opponent, to find that it had charged Fire ball in his hands, it grew, and grew, and when you got over the shock, it was to late to run.

"Nobody ever Chooses, Neither! Because they all died!" It yelled as he threw it at you.

Pulling the sword out in front of you to block it. It closed in, and you prepared for the worst. The ball collided with your sword, and you pointlessly tried to push it back. To your surprise it was working, not to well, but it was working.

'You know, some wind powers would really come in handy right about now!' You think.

A gust of wind blows your hair, you look to see a wall of air pushing against the ball.

"It couldn't have been that easy!" You yell, Angrily. You jump back, and try something else,
'Fire should erupt from my sword, slicing this ball in two, and hitting my opponent.'
A swirl of fire erupted from the hilt of the sword, engulfing it in flames. Swinging it, it slices right through the ball, and a scream was heard. The dust settled, you fell to you knee's, weakened. The strength was drained from your body, as you look at your enemy he was in the same boat.

"What do you...say we...call this... a draw?" It asked in between gasps, " neither of us can continue... this fight for much longer."

"Draw..."You gasped, dropping your sword to the ground.

"Whats your name?" it asked.

"You can call me..." Seeing as you were pretty sure that you would be here for a long time, you could think up an ailias to go by.
"X!!!" You say with a grin.

Omnimon started to walk away but turned slightly, "We will meet again...X!" It yelled.

Putting the sword in it's newly shaped sheath, you stumbe over to a rock, laid down next to it, and tied a chain around the hilt, so you would wake up to intruders wanting to take it.
131122.title: X is born!!!!

1311222.content:
Not sleeping well, you decide to get a feel for your new world. Wandering around aimlessly, you find a small village nearby. It looks peacfull, exept for the dark looking Digimon roaming around. You spot a girl in trouble, she had a Cat-Digimon with her. Both were laying on the ground, looking realy beat up.

Swiftly grabbing a cloak from a nearby clothes rack, you pull it over yourself.
One of the dark Digimon was preparing the final swing, but you stopped it. Your sword seemed happy to be free from it's sheath.

"Who are you?!" One of them hissed.
Silently, you hacked away at them until the dissolved into the air. Without a word, you sheath your sword and begin to walk away.
The girl was helped by the village naitives, and you left.
A few miles away you make a small fire and think to your self. Leaning on a rock next to the fire with your eye's closed.
"That was kind of fun!" You chuckle. "But I should probably try to make a proffit from this or something..."

A sound to your left grabs your attention. The girl had followed you, man...She's persistant!

Not wanting to make friends, or rather, the 'wrong' friends, you get up and snuff out the fire with a little sand and walk away.

"Wait!" The girl asked as she fell to her knee's.
"Kari!" The cat called in sympothy. "The least you could do is hear her out!" It yelled.

You stopped, and turned around.
Restarting the fire and making it bigger, You tend to some of her still fresh wounds...

A few other humans and digimon reinforced the walls as the humans were strapped in armors similar to those of their digimon. The signal was given, the wall erupted with a wall of lead, the forward enemy lines had broken as the back lines moved forward, massive beasts appeared, their armor resisting the gunfire from the snipers as all other shells bounced off.They charged forward, massive hammers prepared for striking down the defenders. The melee fighters emerged from the gates brandishing weapons that glowed in the clearing clouds. The men with lances were out front, impaling the massive beasts holding them at bay whilst the swordsmen went to work on their armors. The wall opened fire again killing the weakened beasts as the swordsmen holding dual blades caused havic further in the enemy lines at a stunning pace. At the back of the group someting massive stood up towering over the rest like a monolith emmitting its own howl. Everyone seemed to be running towards the fortress now, the gunners resumed firing clearing enough for the fighters to come in and secure the front gate. The enemy lines were devastated leaving only the strongest all eyes locked on the massive beasts, especially the big one. The remanants of the army ran at the fortress except for the big one. He dislodged a sword that looked like a flattened bus sharpened to a point then melted with fifteen other buses. The gunners opened fire again getting through the damaged armor. You saw the chance, you signal the swordsmen and assault gunners to climb the beast. Over the wall they slid down, the stupid beast didnt notice the sword was crawling with troops firing several hundred bullets into his arms as well as the swordsmen going at it with a hacking motion. The beast let out another scream as he pulled hard on the sword dislodging it from the sand, he had just noticed the crawling troops over his armor. The girl re-appears handing you a shell labeled, "CAUTION, High Explosive shell" she grabs your gun dropping the clip and ejecting the one round putting in the new bullet. She points to a weakened point of the giant's helmet before jumping back to her ledge shooting the smaller beasts with her rifle. The point was there with splattered paint bullet. The giant shook the smaller troops off, good because this shell was going to hurt. The giant looks toward you noticing you looking in his red eyes. He screamed lifting his blade ready to strike. you yell back, pulling the trigger. The gun seemed to take a second to fire the mysterious bullet. It rocketed out of the barrel screaming to the giant leaving a pale green smoke trail. The bullet hit tearing into the armor and further into the giant's skull. It screamed again dropping its monstrous blade gripping is head at the impact site. It kept screaming before being rocked by a huge explosion tearing a three-foot hole in the head. The beast stumbled backwards away from the fortress away from the waiting troops before falling into the dessert sand. 13212212.title: CHARGE!!!!!!!!!!

13213.content: You recognized it immediatley, Beezlemon! "Crap, how do I stop a mega level like him?" You look on helplessley as Beezlemon torments a tribe of Pixiemon, attacking mercilessly. "Darkness Claw!", as the last of the pixie on where sliced to pieces, Beezlemon absorbed their data, breathing deepley in satisfaction. He then said something that made your blood cold," its very rude to linger like that you know." As he turn around he seemed to vanish, and rematerialized right in front of you! You fell backward and rolled back down the dune. When you got back on your feet, there he was, smiling wickedley. "I feel a sudden urge to, spread my WING'S", he then reached behind his back, and pulled out a toy gun. "Beezlemon, mode CHANGE!", a flash of light then you saw that beezlemon, had wings and a large gun, where his right hand should have been. "Beezlemon Blast Mode", he then took to the skys and put his focus back on you. "Corona destroyer", as the energy wave rushed from his blaster and charged at you, you heard Radia's voice, 'block it, raise your magnum child quickley'. You raise your magnum not seeing the point, that is until you see the wave was being stopped, by the gun! Then Radia's voice again, 'hurry now child push it back, quickly!' You pushed back as hard as you could, and to your relief and amazement, the wave flew back at a very surprised Beezlemon. You then saw a small explosion, when the smoke cleared, the Beezlemon was nowhere in sight. You smiled until, *ahem*, you turned around to see, the Beezlemon was right behind you! But, he was smiling as if he were, happy, like you had impressed him. " Let me see the gun, now if you'd please", he said holding out his hand. You felt uneasy about disarming yourself, but then he frowned obviousley growing impatient. You surrendered your gun to him to him, he examined it and smiled again, he held the gun to where you saw a symbol, a bird glowing various colors. "As I thought, you were brought here by, Radia a powerful spirit." You nod, your only move, but then you saw him, make a small gesture to take it back. You re-holstered your weapon, not taking your eye off him a moment. Beezlemon changed back to his normal form, and started walking west. "You coming?", he said looking over his shoulder. You struggled to run after him. "Where are we going?", you ask him. "To a friend of mines place, she loves company and always starts cooking dinner around this time and always cooks a lot of food. I was on my way there anyway, I'm sure she'll be happy to set a place for you. But, remember this advice, always keep a smile, always compliment her, and her cooking. Never frown, and never insult her food. I once made a mistake like that, and I spent the best part of, the next 3 hours running around the desert, avoiding her. If she ask to kiss, hug, or to touch you, or your things, always say, 'that's fine', never say,'no'. If she chases you, for some reason, always run or hide, eithers good, never fight her. You will lose guaranteed, that gun won't help you, she is much stronger than I am." "Scary thought", you say. "Yes it is, oh I just remembered I never got your name." "Oh, right my name is, Gordon", you tell him. "Lame, while your here you may need a new, better name, I'll call you Rex.", Beezlemon said. "OK, speaking of names, your friend. What's her name?" "Oh", Beezlemon said, "her name is...."
13213.title: A battle with Beezlemon

132132.content: "Beezlemon! Your here! Wow, for once your early.", said a strange lady digimon.You notice that this Digimon has cat ears, and two tails. She has long red claws, and gold rings on her arms and tails. Her dark purple eyes turn to you with curiosity, then she shows a wide toothy smile. You can feel her soft gray fur, when she jumps on you. She starts licking you, and rubbing her head on your chest as she purrs. You try to look into her eyes, but they are covered by her long red hair. *ahem*. "Beastmon, this is my friend Rex. He's a human of course, but Radia brought him here", beezlemon said. Beastmon gasped, before she turned back to you with a much stronger sense of curiosity."So wait, does he have a digivice?", she asked in a serious tone. Beezlemon shook his head, "he chose to get a gun instead." Beastmon looked almost disappointed, but a timer going off seemed to interrupt her train of thought. "Oh ya, wash your hands boys, dinnertime!", Beastmon said smiling. As you and beezlemon washed your hands, you hear Beastmon handling her pots and pans to set her table. "Is she always like this? So energetic?", you ask beezlemon. Beezlemon just laughs, "she's been worse." Beastmon's table was packed with food, it was hard to see all she made. Through the whole dinner, beastmon asked you question after question. After dinner was over, you and beezlemon helped with the dishes."Hey Rex", beastmon asked you as you looked up. "I understand that you and beezlemon are gonna save the digital world alone. So your gonna fight the empire, while not being in the resistance. That's dangerous so, could i come with you two?", beastmon asked while watching her own feet. Beezlemon looked at you with a shocked look on his face, waving his hands erratically. You just say yes to her, beastmon is excited. Meanwhile, beezlemon is groaning in disbelief. When the three of you set off, beastmon is trying to keep beezlemon from hitting you. You're walking when the area starts to change, from desert to rocky terrain with some vegetation. You hear a massive crash over the next hill, you start running in order to see the commotion. You see two digimon, one is a rock monster. The other is smaller, a women with a snake arm and knee length braids. "Who are they?", you ask your friends. "Golemon and Mervamon. But what are they running from?", beezlemon asked. "BLAST BLAZE!", a fireball misses golemon as multiple black shapes appear. "Oh, blacktyrannomon. That makes sense", beastmon said calmly. beastmon shook her head, then looked down only to see you shooting at one of those viral behemoths! Beastmon drags a confused beezlmon down the hill, in order to save you from the beast. Mervamon and golemon were unsure of the strangers, but decided to stand by them to fight til they could get answers. Beezlemon changed to blast mode, before getting in the fight. You and the digimon stand against the enemy, 3 of them for everyone of you. Golemon and mervamon stood ready, while beastmon pushed an exhausted and confused you back from the fight. Beezlemon poised his weapons, and the digimon launched their attacks. Beastmon: "Vampire wave!" Golemon: "Rock punch!" Beezlemon blast mode: "Double Impact!" Mervamon: "Olympia Kai!" You watched not only in awe at the ease of which the army of evil digimon was destroyed, but also in horror as a stray had backed you into a corner and knocked your gun away. "Madness Merry-Go-Round!", said a female voice as a small tornado tore the digimon apart. Mervamon and Golemon, stand there while you and your friends tell them how you'd come to be on the hill. Mervamon says she and Golemon are on the run, from the digimon empire. You then pass out, much to the others concern. Then shock, upon closer inspection, there is a gash on your arm where blacktyrannomon hit you. You wake up to see black nothingness, then a bright light. "Fear not Rex, you are only having a vision in your sleep. You had fainted from blood loss", you turn and realize the voice is radia, the one who brought you here. Meanwhile, your friends are tending to your wound. Out of nowhere, your gun begins to glow. In your vision, radia wanted to replace your weapon with a more useful tool. 1331.content:
You look at the digimon before you, he had yellow skin as well as blue eyes and resembled thast of a minature T-rex.

"My name is Agumon" he tells you and you shake hands.

"Nice to meet you" you reply "So how about we try and save this world?"

"Alright" Agumon agrees and you pull out your digivice which was that of a Digivice Burst like that from Digimon Data squad although this one was a mixture of the color dark red and black. You hit a button and find that you have a map of the current area. You look to see there was a village though no alignment was shown so you figured that it was best to head there first.

After a few minutes of walking you find that with good reason the town didn't have an alinment marker, it was being cloaked. You stared around as you saw a slave camp full of human and digimon alike. You felt hatred at the site and wanted it all destroid and so did Agumon. You gripped your digivice tightly and then said three words "Dark D.N.A. charge!"

Suddenly a ominous purple aura surounded you and Agumon. You knew what was happening, Agumon was digivolving into that of his virus form. You wathced not in horror, not in fear, but instead in happyness as Agumon transformed into SkullGreymon. SkullGreymon picks you up and sets you on his shoulder and then the both of you charge into the slave camp, screaming, laughing, and enjoying it. You felt alive as you slaughtered the evil digimon using SkullGreymon's Dark Shot. You hop of SkullGreymon's shoulder and walk towards the cages as the fires from the battle burn in the background. The helpless captives before you, scared and some beging for mercy as you aprouch. You chuckle a small laugh and then smash the locks on the cages with a simple punch, freeing the captives. The all exit the cages but don't run away which you found odd.

"Why don't you run away" you ask them?

"We have nowhere to run to" explained a teenage girl about the age off thirteen.

"Is that so" you asked and the rest of them nod "Why don't you go back to the resistance?"

"Becuase they abandoned us as soon as we got captured" the teenage girl's digimon replied, she was a floramon.

"Those bastards" you grip your fist in anger cursing the resistance for abandoning such helpless kids and digimon!

"Can we come with you" asked a small younge blond haired boy no older than you'd say six?

You crouch in front of the little boy and then place yoru hand on his head "Sure you can" you reply with a smile. You stand back up and SkullGreymon is standing behind you.

"The enemies have been exterminated" he tells you somewhat happily.

"Very well" you reply then turn around to your new outcast allies "My name is Alex and this is my partner SkullGreymon" you yell speaking like that of a leader. "For too long has this war ravaged this world and for too long has the evil's of this world gone unjustified. I am speaking not only of the digimom emperor but also the resistance as they have as much to do with the deaths and engagement of you countless children and digimon. I, Alex, shall not stand for this! I can't stand by as my fellow digimon and human friends watch as their brothers in arms or sisters in arms die! I shall create my own group...no my own army! One not of darkness, not of light, but of true freedom and peace! Who is with me?"

The army of human and digimon alike all cheer and shout as they pledge their undying loyalty to you. You walk over to a small destroid shed and find cape that of the digimon emperor and put it on before having Agumon burn the symbole off replacign it with you own, a symbole of a digivice.You then go back out and fidn the girl from before and her floramon bowing before you.

"Rise" you tell them "no need for that" you tell them "this is an amry of freedom not one of lords or kings."

"Yes sir" they reply standing up.

The girl then takes the time to introduce herself "My name is Nina Tachina but you can just call me Nina" she tells you.

"Nice to meet you" you reply "as well as you Floramon."

Agumon walks up to you and asks you "Where do we go from here?"

info.brief_description: Choose your side and fight to victory in this Season 02 "What If...?" story!
info.description:
(Based on Season 02)
The Digimon Emperor still reigns with an iron fist, with his own "Dark DigiDestined" at his disposal! DigiDestined and Digimon alike arm themselves and prepare for total war! Will the Digital World be able to survive the coming conflict?
Will you help the DigiDestined defeat the Emperor? Or will you help Ken crush the resistance? Or will you be a mercenary, fighting for your own ends?

The choice is yours. Take up your sword and prepare for THE DIGITAL WARS!
